sub_title: Commercially driven legal, tax, corporate compliance expert  at Centralis Group
summary:
Result driven professional with 15 years comprehensive experience in the international business environment. Consulted many international companies with the set-up, management and expansion of their international corporate establishments.

- (International) Corporate Compliance
- Global Business Expansion
- Team Leader & Management
- International Corporate Restructurings
- M&A Projects
- Holding, royalty & finance structures
- Asset Protection Structures
- Commercial Strategy

Specialties: International corporate restructuring & International corporate compliance and International expansion.
